module.name: devices
module.summary: Device nodes and interfaces for many basic system devices.

desc.p: This module creates the device node concept and provides the policy for many of the device files. Notable exceptions are the mass storage and terminal devices that are covered by other modules.
This module creates the concept of a device node. That is a char or block device file, usually in /dev. All types that are used to label device nodes should use the dev_node macro.

Additionally, this module controls access to three things:
the device directories containing device nodes
device nodes as a group
individual access to specific device nodes covered by this module.

module.required: Depended on by other required modules.

interface.name: dev_node
interface.summary: Make the passed in type a type appropriate for use on device nodes (usually files in /dev).

param.name: object_type
param.summary: The object type that will be used on device nodes.

interface.name: dev_relabel_all_dev_nodes
interface.summary: Allow full relabeling (to and from) of all device nodes.

interface.name: dev_list_all_dev_nodes
interface.summary: List all of the device nodes in a device directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed to list device nodes.

interface.name: dev_setattr_generic_dirs
interface.summary: Set the attributes of /dev directories.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_list_all_dev_nodes
interface.summary: Dontaudit attempts to list all device nodes.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain to dontaudit listing of device nodes.

interface.name: dev_add_entry_generic_dirs
interface.summary: Add entries to directories in /dev.

interface.name: dev_create_generic_dirs
interface.summary: Create a directory in the device directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed to create the directory.

interface.name: dev_delete_generic_dirs
interface.summary: Delete a directory in the device directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed to create the directory.

interface.name: dev_relabel_generic_dev_dirs
interface.summary: Allow full relabeling (to and from) of directories in /dev.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_getattr_generic_files
interface.summary: dontaudit getattr generic files in /dev.

interface.name: dev_rw_generic_files
interface.summary: Read and write generic files in /dev.

interface.name: dev_delete_generic_files
interface.summary: Delete generic files in /dev.

interface.name: dev_manage_generic_files
interface.summary: Create a file in the device directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed to create the files.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_getattr_generic_pipes
interface.summary: Dontaudit getattr on generic pipes.

interface.name: dev_getattr_generic_blk_files
interface.summary: Allow getattr on generic block devices.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_getattr_generic_blk_files
interface.summary: Dontaudit getattr on generic block devices.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_setattr_generic_blk_files
interface.summary: Dontaudit setattr on generic block devices.

interface.name: dev_create_generic_chr_files
interface.summary: Allow read, write, and create for generic character device files.

interface.name: dev_getattr_generic_chr_files
interface.summary: Allow getattr for generic character device files.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_getattr_generic_chr_files
interface.summary: Dontaudit getattr for generic character device files.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_setattr_generic_chr_files
interface.summary: Dontaudit setattr for generic character device files.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_setattr_generic_symlinks
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to set the attributes of symbolic links in device directories (/dev).

interface.name: dev_create_generic_symlinks
interface.summary: Create symbolic links in device directories.

interface.name: dev_delete_generic_symlinks
interface.summary: Delete symbolic links in device directories.

interface.name: dev_manage_generic_symlinks
interface.summary: Create, delete, read, and write symbolic links in device directories.

interface.name: dev_relabel_generic_symlinks
interface.summary: Relabel symbolic links in device directories.

interface.name: dev_manage_all_dev_nodes
interface.summary: Create, delete, read, and write device nodes in device directories.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_rw_generic_dev_nodes
interface.summary: Dontaudit getattr for generic device files.

interface.name: dev_manage_generic_blk_files
interface.summary: Create, delete, read, and write block device files.

interface.name: dev_manage_generic_chr_files
interface.summary: Create, delete, read, and write character device files.

interface.name: dev_filetrans
interface.summary: Create, read, and write device nodes. The node will be transitioned to the type provided.

param.name: file
param.summary: Type to which the created node will be transitioned.

param.name: objectclass(es)
param.summary: Object class(es) (single or set including {}) for which this the transition will occur.

interface.summary: Read, write, create, and delete all block device files.

interface.name: dev_manage_all_chr_files
interface.summary: Read, write, create, and delete all character device files.

interface.name: dev_getattr_mtrr_dev
interface.summary: Get the attributes of the memory type range registers (MTRR) device.

interface.name: dev_read_mtrr
interface.summary: Read the memory type range registers (MTRR). (Deprecated)

desc.p: Read the memory type range registers (MTRR). This interface has been deprecated, dev_rw_mtrr() should be used instead.
The MTRR device ioctls can be used for reading and writing; thus, read access to the device cannot be separated from write access.

interface.name: dev_write_mtrr
interface.summary: Write the memory type range registers (MTRR). (Deprecated)

desc.p: Write the memory type range registers (MTRR). This interface has been deprecated, dev_rw_mtrr() should be used instead.
The MTRR device ioctls can be used for reading and writing; thus, write access to the device cannot be separated from read access.

interface.name: dev_rw_mtrr
interface.summary: Read and write the memory type range registers (MTRR).

interface.name: dev_write_rand

interface.summary: Set the attributes of the the power management device.

interface.name: dev_getattr_sysfs_dirs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of sysfs directories.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dev_search_sysfs
interface.summary: Search the sysfs directories.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_search_sysfs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search sysfs.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dev_list_sysfs
interface.summary: List the contents of the sysfs directories.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dev_write_sysfs_dirs
interface.summary: Write in a sysfs directories.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dev_read_sysfs
interface.summary: Allow caller to read hardware state information.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading hardware state information.

interface.name: dev_rw_sysfs
interface.summary: Allow caller to modify hardware state information.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type modifying hardware state information.

interface.name: dev_read_urand
interface.summary: Read from pseudo random devices (e.g., /dev/urandom)

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_read_urand
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read from pseudo random devices (e.g., /dev/urandom)

interface.name: dev_write_urand
interface.summary: Write to the pseudo random device (e.g., /dev/urandom). This sets the random number generator seed.

interface.name: dev_getattr_generic_usb_dev
interface.summary: Getattr generic the USB devices.

interface.name: dev_setattr_generic_usb_dev
interface.summary: Setattr generic the USB devices.

interface.name: dev_rw_generic_usb_dev
interface.summary: Read and write generic the USB devices.

interface.name: dev_mount_usbfs
interface.summary: Mount a usbfs filesystem.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dev_associate_usbfs
interface.summary: Associate a file to a usbfs filesystem.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: The type of the file to be associated to usbfs.

interface.name: dev_getattr_usbfs_dirs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a directory in the usb filesystem.

interface.name: dev_dontaudit_getattr_usbfs_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of a directory in the usb filesystem.

interface.name: dev_search_usbfs
interface.summary: Search the directory containing USB hardware information.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dev_list_usbfs
interface.summary: Allow caller to get a list of usb hardware.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type getting the list.

interface.name: dev_setattr_usbfs_files
interface.summary: Set the attributes of usbfs filesystem.

interface.name: dev_read_usbfs
interface.summary: Read USB hardware information using the usbfs filesystem interface.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: dev_rw_usbfs
interface.summary: Allow caller to modify usb hardware configuration files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type modifying the options.

interface.name: dev_manage_xen

interface.summary: Execmod the zero device (/dev/zero).

interface.name: dev_create_zero_dev
interface.summary: Create the zero device (/dev/zero).

interface.name: dev_unconfined
interface.summary: Unconfined access to devices.
